event.description: Crippen Station put into orbit
Crippen Station fitted with construction platforms
Tikonov Accords signed, Oleg Tikonov assassinated, Second Soviet Civil War begins
Second Soviet Civil War ends, Western Alliance formed
Alliance World Parliament formed
Western Alliance Space Command formed
AS Altair launched
Kearny and Fuchida begin publishing theories
First self-sustaining fusion reaction developed
First commercially available fusion power plant developed
Asian Co-Prosperity Sphere formed
Osaka Agreement announced
First working fusion drive developed
AS Columbia voyages to Mars
Magellan Project initiated
Magellan One launched
Takayoshi Fuchida dies
Thomas Kearny dies
Terran Alliance formed
Kearny-Fuchida Drive proven feasible
Deimos Project authorized
First hyperspatial jump made
Raymond Bache becomes first human to experience hyperspatial jump, TAS Pathfinder makes jump to Tau Ceti
First scientific outpost outside Sol system established
Research outpost established on New Earth
TAS Ark launched, first interstellar colony established on New Earth
Terran Space Navy created
TAS Charger launched
Liberator misjumps, Colonization Procedure Referendum passed
First Alliance Grand Survey initiated
First Alliance Grand Survey completed
Tikonov settled, Ryan Cartel formed

Korvin Doctrine established

Marik declares independence, Charles Marik forms Republic of Marik, Outer Reaches Rebellion ends
Covenant of New Avalon ratified, Jason Hasek voted first Prime Minister of New Avalon
Victor Liao dies, Irenna Liao elected President of Liao

Samantha Calderon dies, Timothy Calderon named Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds
Capellan Hegemony founded, Capellan Renaissance begins, Shiro Kurita born

Stewart Commonality annexed by FWL, James McKenna takes command of Terran Alliance Navy
Shiro Kurita named First Citizen of Galedon
Federation of Skye formed
TAS Dreadnought, the first true combat warship, launched
Alliance of Galedon formed

Christopher Marik marries Madelyne Sian and their descendants are denied the FWL Captain-Generalcy, Capellan-Supremacy War begins, Tenno Kurita born, Hector Rowe commits suicide, Maxwell Rowe named RWR First Consul

Arboris secedes from Capellan Hegemony, FWL withdraws alliance
Capellan-Supremacy War ends, Paula Aris commits suicide
Capellan Commonality formed, Megaris system settled, People's Independence Party formed
Council of One summit meeting
Samantha system settled
Terran Alliance dissolved, Grant Zoli murdered
Terran Hegemony formed, Duchy of Liao formed, Orbital bombardment of Strand Rock, Terran Hegemony Charter issued
Juliano Marik signs Treaty of Terra, Renfield system settled, James McKenna elected TH Director-General, TH invasion of Quentin, Errai, and Helen

Draconis Combine founded, FS Department of Military Intelligence formed
Ishtar system settled, TH invasion of Terra Firma, Capella, and Nanking

TH Peer's List created
Kyle, Dorian, Corval, and Brion Sian-Marik executed for the assassination of Geraldine Marik

Capellan Confederation founded, FWL begins occupation of CC border worlds, Franco Liao named first Chancellor of CC

Robert Marsden named LC Archon Basileus

Brian Cameron killed, Judith Cameron elected TH Director-General

War between LC and FWL begins

Armistice between LC and FWL concluded, FWL War Powers Act passed, Rim War begins, Simon Davion named First Prince of FS
Judith Cameron steps down, Richard Cameron elected TH Director-General
War between LC and FWL renewed, Joseph Stewart named Captain-General of FWL, FWL forces routed
Parker Kurita killed, Nihongi Von Rohrs named DC Coordinator, Jason Kurita killed, Daniel Sorenson becomes Lord of Rasalhague, DC line of succession becomes blurred
Peter Marik assassinated, Rim War ends
Arden Baxter assassinated, Stephen Liao named Chancellor of CC
War between LC and FWL renewed, Terrence Marik refuses Captain-Generalcy of FWL, FWL War Powers Act and Parliamentary Committee disbanded, Terrence Marik named Captain-General of FWL

TH Nomination laws revised

First use of BattleMechs by FWL, First general strike in TH history
Michael Steiner dies, Steven Steiner named LC Archon

Star League Accords signed, Star League formed, Terrence Liao dies, Ursula Liao named Chancellor of CC, Shandra Noruff-Cameron appointed Commander-in-Chief of Star League Defense Force, Ian Cameron named First Lord of the Star League

Star League Directive 21 instituted, Santiago Massacre, Ian Cameron delegates all duties as TH Director-General to his heir and the President of the TH Hegemony Congress, United Triumph Military Exercises take place, Border Guards Agreement passed, Executive Order 4 issued
Malagrotta Affair, RWR Universal Act of Loyalty passed, Bureau of Star League Affairs created
Harsh Periphery trade restrictions and taxes passed

LC Tax Reform Debate of 2575, Pollux Proclamation issued, RWR Manchester Directive issued, Reunification War begins, Taurian Campaign begins, Shandra Noruff-Cameron steps down, General Carlos Dangmar Lee named Commander- in-Chief of SLDF
Case Amber adopted
Canopian Campaign begins
Star League officially declares war
Ian Cameron renounces tenets of Ares Conventions

Viola Steiner-Dinesen killed, Kevin Steiner-Dinesen named LC Archon, TC surrenders, Marantha Calderon commits suicide, Henry Calderon named TC Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds, Rim Provisional Government surrenders, Taurian Campaign ends, Rim Worlds Campaign ends
Reunification War ends, TC, MC, RWR, and OA become Territorial States of the Star League

Puraj, D'mir, and Rajneesh Selaj implicated in FWL bombing and sentenced to death, D'mir Selaj commits suicide

FWL Parliament dissolved and arrested, FWL Proxy Parliament declares Oliver Marik FWL Council Lord and Boris Marik Captain-General of FWL, FS War of Davion Succession ends, Joseph Davion dies, Richard Davion named FS First Prince, Jonathan Steiner dies, Michael Steiner II named LC Archon, General Rebecca Fetladral named Commander-in-Chief of SLDF
Elise Marik captured

Richard Davion dies, John Davion named FS First Prince
Simon Cameron begins tour of Star League
Simon Cameron killed, Richard Cameron named First Lord of the Star League, Aleksandr Kerensky named Star League Regent
Amendment to Council Edict of 2650 illegally passed, Laws imposing heavy taxes on Periphery passed
Stefan Amaris meets Richard Cameron

Terra liberated, Jerome Blake returns to Terra, Stefan Amaris executed

Star League disbanded, Robert Steiner II dies, Jennifer Steiner named LC Archon
Each Lord of the High Council individually gives Jerome Blake responsibility for the reconstruction of Terra
Court of the Star League sealed

FWL Resolution 288 passed, FWL Rule of 75 repealed, 80% of SLDF undertakes Operation Exodus, the remainder pledging assistance to the Terran reconstruction effort, Department of Communications First Circuit reestablished, Prinz Eugen Incident, General Order 137 issued
Conrad Toyama appointed Chief Administrator of Dieron HPG, ComStar Letter of Credit instituted, FS Towne Debacle

First Succession War begins, Department of Communications changes its name to ComStar, CS Operation Silver Shield approved and begun, DC Minoru Kurita proclaims himself First Lord of the Star League, MC issues Declaration of Independence, Pentagon Worlds settled
Kenyon Marik declares himself First Lord of the Star League, Neutrality of CS outlined by Communications Protocol of 2787, FS War Zone Actions become law

First FS offensive against DC, FS Reformation begins, FS Ministry of Information, Intelligence, and Operations formed

LC taxes and CS Interdiction lifted, Conrad Toyama begins recruitment trip in Periphery, Clan Wolverine annihilated

Second Succession War begins
Nicholas Kerensky killed, Clan Wolf absorbs Clan Widowmaker

FWL Interdiction lifted, CS War ends, CS Organizational Edict 3056 expands ROM, Michelle Dupreas resigns and is assassinated, Janice Laidlaw appointed Head of CS ROM, CS Operation Holy Shroud begins, Zabu Kurita commits seppuku, Yoguchi Kurita named DC Coordinator, DC ISF attached to Draconis Combine Mustered Soldiery

Paul Marik dies, Iris Marik named Captain-General of FWL, Brock Marik named Captain-General of FWL, Hollings York proposes abolishment of CS ROM and is assassinated, Adrienne Sims named Primus of CS, Hollings York named a saint
Brock Marik dies, Thaddeus Marik II named Captain-General of FWL
Tarlak Liao assassinated, Ingrid Liao named Chancellor of CC
FS Great Lee Turkey Shoot, FS Warrior's Cabal formed, Marco Steiner retires, Giovanni Steiner named LC Archon
Some MC Elector positions become hereditary
Adrienne Sims begins having nightmares about an invasion from beyond the Periphery, CS Explorer Corps formed
First CS Explorer Corps ships enter the Periphery, Peter Davion II assassinated, Andrew Davion named FS First Prince
Thaddeus Marik II dies, Stephan Marik named Captain-General of FWL, Hugai Kurita dies, Hohiro Kurita named DC Coordinator
CC Decree of Martial Unity issued, Eugenio Rosario killed
FWL Concord of Danais signed
Adrienne Sims dies, Yin Takami named Primus of CS, CS Tripitz affair takes place, CS Operation Holy Shroud II begins
Ingrid Liao dies, Tormax Liao named Chancellor of CC, Giovanni Steiner dies, Alessandro Steiner named LC Archon
Clan Sea Fox becomes Clan Diamond Shark
LC Deep Raid of 2987
CC Death Commandos formed, CS First Circuit reorganized to include Tharkad, Atreus, Sian, and New Avalon
FWL Special Resolution 512 passed, DC Strike of 2989
Tormax Liao deposed, Maximilian Liao named Chancellor of CC
Stephan Marik dies, Janos Marik named Captain-General of FWL
Yin Takami dies, Allen Rusenstein named Primus of CS
FWL Accountability Edict issued, FWL Logistics Act passed
Andrew Davion dies, Ian Davion named FS First Prince
CS begins extensive recruitment in the Periphery, Takashi Kurita named Commander of the DC Otomo
CS begins supplying Bandit Kings
LC Operation Concentrated Weakness begins
Michael Hasek marries Marie Davion-St. Claire
CS Jolly Roger Affair takes place, Hohiro Kurita assassinated, Takashi Kurita named DC Coordinator, Wolf's Dragoons leave for the Inner Sphere
CC Ministry of Development reorganized, Wolf's Dragoons appear in FS
Thomas Marik joins CS, Allen Rusenstein resigns, Julian Tiepolo named Primus of CS
Alessandro Steiner is forced to retire, Katrina Steiner named LC Archon
Wolf's Dragoons return to Clan Wolf for refitting, Marius O'Reilly named MH Imperator
CS instigates Marik Civil War
Tamara Centrella dies, Kyalla Centrella named MC Magestrix
Ian Davion killed, Hanse Davion named FS First Prince, Michael Hasek-Davion named FS Duke of New Syrtis
Anton Marik begins Marik Civil War

Anton Marik kills Joshua Wolf and is killed by Wolf's Dragoons, CS Precentor ROM Vesar Kristofur excommunicated, FS New Avalon Institute of Science created, Neil Avellar II named OA Parliamentary President
Thomas Calderon named TC Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds
Wolf's Dragoons return to Clan Wolf again for refitting, Theodore Kurita and Tomoe Sakade marry
CC makes contact with Michael Hasek-Davion, Katrina Steiner sends Peace Proposal to all Houses, OA Educational Exchange Program begins
Concord of Kapteyn signed, McCarron's War begins, Federated-Commonwealth Alliance Document signed
Third Succession War ends, McCarron's War ends, CC Operation Doppelganger takes place
FS Operation Galahad 3026 takes place
FS Operation Galahad 3027 takes place, LC Operation Thor 3027 takes place

Fourth Succession War begins, Tormana Liao captured by FS, FS Northwind Agreement takes effect, CC Operation Riposte takes place, Gray Death Legion discovers Helm Library Core, Wolf's Dragoons take An Ting HPG, Hanse Davion and Melissa Steiner marry, Wolf's Dragoons leave DC, Federated Commonwealth unofficially formed, Maria Morgraine and Redjack Ryan marry, Greater Valkyrate formed

St. Ives Compact formed, Tikonov Free Republic formed, CC Operation Intruders Communion takes place, FS framed for destruction of Sarna HPG and Interdicted, CS covertly attacks NAIS, Julian Tiepolo dies, Myndo Waterly named Primus of CS, CS 'Mechs stationed at FS HPGs, FS Interdiction lifted, DC and Wolf's Dragoons battle on Crossing, Michael Hasek-Davion killed

Fourth Succession War ends, Duchy of Andurien secedes from FWL, FWL Internal Emergency Act passed, CS Operation Rosebud initiated, Theodore Kurita named DC Gunji no Kanrei, FS Sarna March created, Andurien/MC invasion of CC begins, CS gives Star League Battlemechs to DC
Thomas Marik leaves CS, CC attacked by Andurien/Canopus alliance, FS absorbs Tikonov Free Republic
Circinus Federation President C. J. McIntyre dies, H. R. McIntyre named Circinus Federation President, Black Warriors commander Adam Cirion dies, H. R. McIntyre named commander of Black Warriors

Free Rasalhague Republic formed, CS Operation Rosebud ends, Anastasius Focht joins CS, CS Operation Flush begins, DC Ronin War takes place, FS and LC undergo Skye Crisis, Neil Avellar II marries Rebecca DeSanders, Edward Calderon dies, Janice Calderon tours TC, Circinus Federation begins invasion of Illyrian Palatinate
Bomb kills Janos and Duggan Marik and wounds Thomas Marik, Duncan Marik named Captain-General of FWL, CS Readjustment Act of 3035 passed, Mitchell Avellar born, MH invades Astrokaszy
Thomas Marik named Captain-General of FWL, Maximilian Liao dies, Romano Liao named Chancellor of CC
FWL Addendum to the Incorporation passed, Andurien regained by FWL, TC Ministry of Trade andColonization arrested, Camillo Avellar born, Galahad Frews named Grand Knight of the Brotherhood of Randis
CS 'Mechs stationed at CC HPGs, Janice Calderon contracts Brisbane Virus, Patrice Avellar born

War of 3039 ends, Katrina Steiner dies, Kyalla Centrella removed, Emma Centrella named MC Magestrix
CS 'Mechs stationed at LC HPGs, Armed Forces of the Federated Commonwealth created
Ian Calderon joins Green Mountain Boys, Circinus Civil War begins, Paula Trevaline killed
FWL League General Accounting Office created
CS Operation Flush ends
Felix Calderon's Jumpship disappears
Joshua Marik born, TC forces destroy misjumped FC JumpShip, TC begins military buildup

CS Explorer Corps vessel Outbound Light encounters Clan Smoke Jaguar, Bidding for the right to invade takes place, Marius O'Reilly dies, Sean O'Reilly named MH Imperator, Sean O'Reilly's title changed to Caesar, MH military buildup begins, James Moroney forms Rim Collection
Clan Operation Revival takes place, CS makes contact with the Clans

Anastasius Focht appointed CS ambassador to the Clans, Clans invade Inner Sphere, Leo Showers killed, Battle for Wolcott, CS begins aiding the Clans, FC retakes Twycross, Turtle Bay Massacre, Invasion halted

Ulric Kerensky voted Clan ilKhan, Natasha Kerensky named Khan of Clan Wolf, Reserve Clans brought in, Invasion resumes, Camelot Command taken by Clan Snord, MC makes overtures to Periphery states about Periphery-wide alliance

Battle for Luthien, Battle of Tukayyid, Demona Aziz rebels and forms WB,Thomas Marik named Primus-in-Exile of Word of Blake, FWL signs HPG service contract with WB, Romano Liao assassinated, Sun-Tzu Liao named Chancellor of CC, Sun-Tzu Liao betrothed to Isis Marik, CS Operation Scorpion takes place, Myndo Waterly assassinated, Sharilar Mori named Primus of CS, All Houses but Marik sign new service contracts with CS, Hanse Davion dies, Phelan Ward named saKhan of Clan Wolf, Clan Ghost Bear suspends individual engagement rules, New Belt Pirates formed

Terran Peace Summit takes place, CS begins announcing troop movements, Mercenary Review and Bonding Commission replaces CS Mercenary Review Board, CS University of Blake begins construction, Jeffrey Calderon and Emma Centrella begin secret negotiations
Takashi Kurita commits seppuku, Theodore Kurita named DC Coordinator, MH invades Lothian League, Fuchida's Fusiliers take control of Tortuga Dominions
Melissa Steiner-Davion assassinated, Thomas Calderon removed, Jeffrey Calderon named TC Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds, TC military buildup ends, MH conquers Lothian League

Federated Commonwealth officially formed, Ryan Steiner assassinated, Archon- Prince Victor Steiner-Davion takes command of FC, Thomas Calderon dies, TC and MC sign Treaty of Taurus, Diplomatic channels between CC and MC reopen, Neil Avellar resigns, Mitchell Avellar named OA Parliamentary President, OA Long Road Program begins

Joshua Marik dies and is replaced with a double by FC, FWL and CC invade FC, Lyran Alliance formed, Isis Marik moves to Sian, Katrina Steiner named Archon of Lyran Alliance, Ulric Kerensky stripped of title of IlKhan, Refusal War, CS opens vaults of history to everyone

Thomas Marik discovered to be a double, DC forces installed as peacekeepers in Chaos March, Clan Wolf becomes both Clan Jade Wolf and Clan Wolf-in-Exile, Word of Blake takes Terra, Elias Crichell named IlKhan and slain, Marthe Pryde named saKhan and later Khan of Clan Jade Falcon, Vlad Ward named Khan of Clan Jade Wolf and later Clan Wolf, Clan Jade Wolf becomes Clan Wolf, Invasion of Coventry, Black Dragon Society and others attempt to assassinate Theodore Kurita.
